notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Study design: E.Z., J.M.W. and J.S. Collection of knee samples: M.J.C., R.L.J., D.S., K.S. and J.M.W. Collection of hip samples: R.A.B. and A.W.M. Proteomics assays: T.I.R. and J.S.C. Molecular QTL and co-localisation analyses: L.S. Differential expression analyses: J.S. and L.S. Pathway association and drug repurposing analyses: J.S. Writing—original draft: J.S., L.S., N.B., J.H.D.B., G.R.W., J.M.W. and E.Z. Writing—comments and review: all authors.
